alert.note: Alert for Delaware (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 4:20PM CDT until June 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR DUBUQUE AND EASTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Worthington, or 19 miles southeast of Manchester, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Asbury, Dyersville, Epworth, Farley, Peosta, Hopkinton, New Vienna, Colesburg, Worthington, Holy Cross, Luxemburg, Rickardsville, Sherrill, Centralia, Sageville, Balltown, Bankston, Durango and Graf. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Iowa.
